dmca.title: TravelChinaGuide wants to stop traveling copy
dmca.body:
Dear Google, Inc. 

1. I, the webmaster of www.travelchinaguide.com, am on behalf of our company, Xi'an Diamond Network Co. Ltd. I am looking forward for your concerns about the websites copied the below pages from our website. 

The offender is www.chinavtour.com. They copied 10 pages of contents from our website. So we are here to ask for your investigation and removal of the infringing pages. 

One more thing I would like to mention here is that our website www.travelchinaguide.com regularly updates our content to ensure the accuracy of the info. Thus we found that some of the contents they copied are now our old versions, so we
